rules: Rule1: If the show has a designer, then either the show has a costume or the show has a set.
Rule2: Provided that the show has an original script, it follows that the show has a writer.
Rule3: Either the show has an original script or the show has a custom design.
Rule4: In cases where the show has a custom design, it also has a lighting designer.
Rule5: If the show has a lighting designer, then the show has a designer.
Rule6: Assuming the region uses local material, the show is successful.
Rule7: The region uses local material or the region imports material.
Rule8: Provided that the region imports material, it has a supplier.
Rule9: If the region has a workshop, then either the region has a training program or, provided the region has a supplier, the show is successful.
Rule10: The region has a workshop or the region has an apprenticeship.
Rule11: In cases where the region has an apprenticeship, either the region has a training program or, if the region has a supplier, the show is successful.
Rule12: Whenever the show is a premier, it has an opening night.
Rule13: If the show has an opening night, then if it is not the case that the show has a script or the show has a costume or the show has a set, then the show is not improvised.
Rule14: Assuming the show has a sound designer, it has a technical director.
Rule15: The show has a sound designer or the show has a stage manager.
Rule16: If the show has a stage manager, then it has a production manager.
Rule17: In cases where the show has a production manager, if the region has a supplier then the show is successful.
Rule18: If a person is a casting director for the show, then the show has a lead role.
Rule19: Provided that a person is a casting director for the show, that person is a director for the show.
Rule20: Either a person is a casting director for the show or a person is a producer for the show.
Rule21: If a person is a producer for the show, then if the show is not successful, the production has funding from a sponsor.
Rule22: Assuming a person is a director for the show, the show has a performer.
Rule23: In cases where the show has a costume, the show is successful.
Rule24: If the show has a set, then the show is successful.
Rule25: Provided that the show has a writer, it has a script.
Rule26: If it is not the case that if the show has a lead role then it has a performer, then the show has an understudy.
Rule27: Whenever it is not the case that if the show has a lead role then it has a performer, then the show does not have an understudy.
Rule28: If it is not the case that the show has a script or the show has a costume or the show has a set, then the show is improvised.
Rule29: If the show is not successful, then it is not the case that the production has funding from a sponsor.
facts: Fact1: The show is a premier.
Fact2: It is not the case that the region has a training program.
Fact3: The show does not have a performer.
Fact4: The show does not have a technical director.
Fact5: The show does not have a script.
